column1: #Text=You need me to help unload Sokka 's funky - smelling sleeping bag ?
#Text=You 're a part of our team now , and - " Toph says : " Look !
#Text=I did n't ask you to help unload my stuff !
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's not the point .
#Text=Ever since you joined us , you 've been nothing but selfish and unhelpful !
#Text=Look here , sugar queen , I gave up everything I had so that I could teach Aang earthbending .
#Text=So do n't you talk to me about being selfish !
#Text=D - did you just slam the door in my face ?!
